p.s: Yesterday I read your e-mail about student exchanges and I was a bit shocked.
Why do you think they are a waste of time?
Did you ever went on a student exchange?
In this e-mail I want to tell you my point of view and why I think student exchanges are not a waste of time.
At the end I hope I can change your mind.
First of all I think you have to know, that with a student exchange you get a lot of experience and meet a lot of new people.
You try new food, learn about new cultures and do different things that you would never do at home.
On my student exchange a year ago I met so many friendly people and lots of good friends.
The people are really helpfullhelpful and you don't feel lonely or homesick.
I tried a lotslot of new things and I collect so many experiences.
I would miss if I never went on a student exchange year.
Even if you feel homesick nowadays there are a lot ways to connect with your family or friends at home.
There is internet so you can call them or even facetime with them, so you can see them.
When you go on an exchange year, your point of view on a few things change and this can be really helpfullhelpful for your future life.
Even if it is totoo expensive for you, there are a lot of programmsprograms that help you or where it is cheaper.
I hope I can change your mind after my e-mail and an exchange year is now an option and not a waste of time for you.
I hope I get an answer from you and when you choose to do this beautiful adventure, write me, so I can send you more informationsinformation or help you.
